hymn.title: Lord, I love You; Lord, take my heart

layout.singingstanza: Lord, I love You: Lord, take my heart. Lord, sat -- u -- rate me. Fill ev -- ery part with Your life di -- vine. Lord, I now sur -- ren -- der all to You. Keep me turn -- ing to You ev -- ery day. Un -- til I'm ex -- press -- ing on -- ly You al -- ways. Un -- til I'm ex -- press -- ing on -- ly You.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, I love You; Lord, take my heart. Lord, saturate me. Fill every part with Your life divine. Lord, I now surrender all to You. Keep me turning to You every day. Until I'm expressing only You always. Until I'm expressing only You.
